courses.name: Linear Algebra and Geometry
courses.instructor: Jeremy Macdonald, Romain Branchereau, Miguel Ayala, Antoine Giard

assessments.title: Assignments released every Friday, Sunday of the following week (with some exceptions). Multiple attempts allowed; no penalty for incorrect answers
assessments.description: Assignments released every Friday, due Sunday of the following week (with some exceptions).  Multiple attempts allowed; no penalty for incorrect answers.

textbooks: Linear Algebra with Applications by W. K. Nicholson - Not specified
otherInfo: Grading Scheme: Two schemes are used, and the higher grade is given. Scheme 1 includes a midterm (20%), while Scheme 2 does not (0%).  Webwork assignments account for 15% in both schemes. Final exam is 65% in Scheme 1 and 85% in Scheme 2. Letter grade intervals are provided, with the possibility of lower boundaries at instructor's discretion.
Email Policy: Use email only for individual matters; use the Ed discussion forum for other issues.
Tutorials: Weekly tutorials by teaching assistants; strongly encouraged to ask questions.
Homework Policy: Collaboration allowed; however, problems cannot be solved by another entity.
Resources for Math Help: Office hours, tutorials, Ed discussion forum, Burnside Math Helpdesk, SciLearn Peer Collab.
Life Difficulties: Contact instructors or the Office of the Dean of Students for support.
University Policies: Policy on Assessment of Student Learning (PASL), Academic integrity, Language (English or French), Accommodations (Student Accessibility and Achievement), Disclaimer.
